steps.name: I check that the "Welcome Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Choose Data Preferences Screen" is displayed
I check that the "First SignIn Screen" is displayed
I click on "SIGN IN WITH EMAIL" button
I enter the email address "tb.gmap.tester@gmail.com" in the input
I check that the "Choose Authentication Screen" is displayed
I click on "SIGN IN WITH A OTP PASSCODE" button
I wait for the OTP code to be sent to my mailbox
